DEMO_325_MSG_010:
̃Can you hear me, ȁ? I've prepared a message for you.
ā
DEMO_325_MSG_020:
̃If you're hearing this, the control systems in this room have failed.
ā
DEMO_325_MSG_030:
̃Little time remains... you must follow my instructions carefully. First, you must activate the control station's backup generators.
ā
DEMO_325_MSG_040:
̃Once back online, they will activate the transporation device. You'll need this in order to reach the Darkiron Bastille.
ā
